subject: adf, Your Chance to Apply for A Credit Card
body:
251839499


















Dear Adf,If your credit history has made getting a credit card difficult, this is the offer for you. The application is simple and the credit decision
is quick. Apply for a First PREMIER Bank credit card that features:









Low APR on purchases
24-hour account access by phone
Monthly credit bureau reporting
Online access to credit education




This is a special opportunity, to get under the First PREMIER Bank umbrella.Apply
now.
Sincerely,
D. Nicholsan
Senior Credit Manager
